mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Jabez Weddle
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Jabez Weddle L. D. Weddle, Guardian until 12.10.1879 when Jabez became 21 Years old Recorded in Ledger Book 2, page 105, in Floyd County Courthouse
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
